verses.verse: <S%H349>How<s%> does the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H910>solitary,<s%> that was <S%H7227>full<s%> of <S%H5971>people!<s%> how is she <S%H1961>become<s%> as a <S%H490>widow!<s%> she that was <S%H7227>great<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H8282>princess<s%> among the <S%H4082>provinces,<s%> how is she <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H4522>tributary!<s%>

She <S%H1058>weeps<s%> sore in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and her <S%H1832>tears<s%> are <S%H5921>on<s%> her <S%H3895>cheeks:<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H157>lovers<s%> she has <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> her: <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H7453>friends<s%> have dealt <S%H898>treacherously<s%> with her, they are <S%H1961>become<s%> her <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H3063>Judah<s%> is gone <S%H1473>into<s%> <S%H1540>captivity<s%> because of <S%H6040>affliction,<s%> and because of <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H5656>servitude:<s%> she <S%H3427>dwells<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> she <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4494>rest:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H7291>persecutors<s%> <S%H5381>overtook<s%> her <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H4712>straits.<s%>

The <S%H1870>ways<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> do <S%H57>mourn,<s%> because <S%H1097>none<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4150>solemn<s%> <S%H4150>feasts:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H8179>gates<s%> are <S%H8076>desolate:<s%> her <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H584>sigh,<s%> her <S%H1330>virgins<s%> are <S%H3013>afflicted,<s%> and she is in <S%H4843>bitterness.<s%>

Her <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> are the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> her <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7951>prosper;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3013>afflicted<s%> her for the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of her <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> her <S%H5768>children<s%> are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6862>enemy.<s%>

And from the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H1926>beauty<s%> is <S%H3318>departed:<s%> her <S%H8269>princes<s%> are <S%H1961>become<s%> like <S%H354>harts<s%> that <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4829>pasture,<s%> and they are <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7291>pursuer.<s%>

<S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of her <S%H6040>affliction<s%> and of her <S%H4788>miseries<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4262>pleasant<s%> things that she <S%H1961>had<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old,<s%> when her <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6862>enemy,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> did <S%H5826>help<s%> her: the <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> her, and did <S%H7832>mock<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> her <S%H4868>sabbaths.<s%>

<S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> has <S%H2399>grievously<s%> <S%H2398>sinned;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> she is <S%H5206>removed:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3513>honored<s%> her <S%H2107>despise<s%> her, <S%H3588>because<s%> they have <S%H7200>seen<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H1571>yes,<s%> she <S%H584>sighs,<s%> and <S%H7725>turns<s%> <S%H268>backward.<s%>

Her <S%H2932>filthiness<s%> is in her <S%H7757>skirts;<s%> she <S%H2142>remembers<s%> not her <S%H319>last<s%> end; therefore she <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6382>wonderfully:<s%> she had <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5162>comforter.<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H7200>behold<s%> my <S%H6040>affliction:<s%> for the <S%H341>enemy<s%> has <S%H1431>magnified<s%> himself.

The <S%H6862>adversary<s%> has <S%H6566>spread<s%> out his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4261>pleasant<s%> things: for she has <S%H7200>seen<s%> that the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into her <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you did <S%H6680>command<s%> that they should not <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H6951>congregation.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> her <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H584>sigh,<s%> they <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> they have <S%H5414>given<s%> their <S%H4262>pleasant<s%> things for <S%H400>meat<s%> to <S%H7725>relieve<s%> the <S%H5315>soul:<s%> <S%H7200>see,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5027>consider;<s%> for I am <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H2151>vile.<s%>

Is it <S%H3808>nothing<s%> to you, <S%H3605>all<s%> you that <S%H5674>pass<s%> by? <S%H5027>behold,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> there be any <S%H4341>sorrow<s%> like to my <S%H4341>sorrow,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5953>done<s%> to me, with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3013>afflicted<s%> me in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>

From <S%H4791>above<s%> has he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> into my <S%H6106>bones,<s%> and it <S%H7287>prevails<s%> against them: he has <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H7272>feet,<s%> he has <S%H7725>turned<s%> me <S%H268>back:<s%> he has <S%H5414>made<s%> me <S%H8076>desolate<s%> and <S%H1739>faint<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of my <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> is <S%H8244>bound<s%> by his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> they are <S%H8276>wreathed,<s%> and <S%H5927>come<s%> up on my <S%H6677>neck:<s%> he has made my <S%H3581>strength<s%> to <S%H3782>fall,<s%> the <S%H136>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> me into their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> from whom I am not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H6965>rise<s%> up.

The <S%H136>LORD<s%> has <S%H5541>trodden<s%> under <S%H5541>foot<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H47>mighty<s%> men in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of me: he has <S%H7121>called<s%> an <S%H4150>assembly<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me to <S%H7665>crush<s%> my <S%H970>young<s%> men: the <S%H136>LORD<s%> has <S%H1869>trodden<s%> the <S%H1330>virgin,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> as in a wine <S%H1660>press.<s%>

For <S%H428>these<s%> things I <S%H1058>weep;<s%> my <S%H5869>eye,<s%> my <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H3381>runs<s%> down with <S%H4325>water,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H5162>comforter<s%> that should <S%H7725>relieve<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7368>far<s%> from me: my <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H8076>desolate,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> <S%H1396>prevailed.<s%>

<S%H6726>Zion<s%> <S%H6566>spreads<s%> forth her <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> her: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> concerning <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> that his <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> should be <S%H5439>round<s%> about him: <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> is as a <S%H5079>menstruous<s%> woman <S%H996>among<s%> them.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> for I have <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against his <S%H6310>commandment:<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> my <S%H4341>sorrow:<s%> my <S%H1330>virgins<s%> and my <S%H970>young<s%> men are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity.<s%>

I <S%H7121>called<s%> for my <S%H157>lovers,<s%> but they <S%H7411>deceived<s%> me: my <S%H3548>priests<s%> and my <S%H2205>elders<s%> gave up the <S%H1478>ghost<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3588>while<s%> they <S%H1245>sought<s%> their <S%H400>meat<s%> to <S%H7725>relieve<s%> their <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

<S%H7200>Behold,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for I am in <S%H6887>distress:<s%> my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> are <S%H2560>troubled;<s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2015>turned<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me; for I have <S%H4784>grievously<s%> <S%H4784>rebelled:<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%> the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H7921>bereaves,<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%> there is as <S%H4194>death.<s%>

They have <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I <S%H584>sigh:<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5162>comfort<s%> me: <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H341>enemies<s%> have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of my <S%H7451>trouble;<s%> they are <S%H7797>glad<s%> that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> it: you will <S%H935>bring<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that you have <S%H7121>called,<s%> and they shall be <S%H3644>like<s%> to me.

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you; and <S%H5953>do<s%> to them, as you have <S%H5953>done<s%> to me for <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H6588>transgressions:<s%> for my <S%H585>sighs<s%> are <S%H7227>many,<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H1742>faint.<s%>
